column1: For the Island and Bay of Bengal Sea areas.

 low  pressure  area  is  likely  to  form over  southeast  Bay  of  Bengal  around  23rd  November.

avel  and  fishing  communities,  engaging  activities  over  South-west  Bay  of  Bengal  and  the
